subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ game was postponed because of rain, so the verdict on whether fans feel snubbed by Carlos Delgado’s response, or lack thereof, to their standing ovation a day earlier will have to wait.
snippet: The Mets’ game was postponed because of rain, so the verdict on whether fans feel snubbed by Carlos Delgado’s response, or lack thereof, to their standing ovation a day earlier will have to wait.
